title: Lone Wolf Mountain
text: Lone Wolf Mountain is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> on <a href="Vancouver%20Island">Vancouver Island</a>, <a href="British%20Columbia">British Columbia</a>, <a href="Canada">Canada</a>, located north of <a href="Tofino%2C%20British%20Columbia">Tofino</a> and south of <a href="Splendor%20Mountain">Splendor Mountain</a>.
